website_summaries.verdict: If you don't want to take a tablet, this natural treatment works well for many.
pros: 2 cm patches are placed behind the ear and are easy to remove
Unlike many motion sickness pills, these patches do not usually cause drowsiness
Easy to put on and remove
cons: Some customers did not find these patches effective

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had terrible motion sickness my whole life to the point where ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had terrible motion sickness my whole life to the point where I couldn’t travel and I would have to drive everywhere just so I wouldn’t embarrass myself by getting dizzy and throwing up. I mean Dramamine works great but it makes me a little out of it-I took this with me when I went to Asia and it worked amazing !!! I went on buses on planes and trains and never got dizzy once !!! I think I can actually travel now you guys !!!!
customer_reviews.author: PinkTulip

customer_reviews.title: These Patches Really Work
customer_reviews.text: These patches really work. I purchased these patches and the band for my first cruise since I normally suffer with motion sickness. The day before I got on the cruise ship I put the band on instead of the patch. Day one and two went ok. No motion sickness. Day three rough waters. I was sick as a dog. Stayed in bed most of the day. Then I remembered that I had the patch. I put one behind each ear and no more sea sickness. I wish I had used the patch first.
customer_reviews.author: Shortyfatleggs

customer_reviews.title: Life saver! Look out fishies, I'm coming for ya!
customer_reviews.text: Never have I been able to fight sea sickness until now. It's a whole new ball game thanks to this product! I went out on my kayak 3 miles in front of Newport Beach on a choppy ass day to test these and Wow! Not only have I tried these multiple times in rough and calm conditions, but these suckers work like a champ! It even helps with anxiety the night before an important day. You'd be surprised what herbs can do when used properly, I'm a supporter for life. Now I can even fish with my pops on the cattle boats and I'm cool as a whistle all day long 🤙🤙🤙
customer_reviews.author: sivART

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!
customer_reviews.text: These patches are AMAZING!! I purchased the scopolomine patch for $85 because it wasn't covered by insurance for my honeymoon because we were going on a boat and driving. I get bad motion sickness when someone else drives or on bigger boats. Well it was a HUGE FAIL. $85 down the drain. I also have a pinched nerve between C1 and C2 that causes pain that makes me nauseous. So I figured after the reviews I would try these and man short o taking a phenergren this product works the best. I have tried Bonine and other pills and the bracelets and nothing helped but this DOES!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: Made no impact whatsoever and I put on two. I was really hoping this would work. I've used the prescribed ones so I was hoping these would be similar but no such luck. To be fair, my motion sickness level is far beyond most people's so maybe it works for the milder cases.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Nixon

customer_reviews.title: A Travel Must Have
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these!!! I have suffered with motion sickness for years. We are extensive travelers and I love to be out on the lake or ocean as much as possible. I tried these on a cruise last December, and they worked so great, I never felt a thing. I even had my girl friend use them, and she agreed, they are a must have when traveling. I will use them for every adventure from here on out! They lasted when we were snorkeling, but not as long. We ended up putting a water proof bandage over them to help them stay on. Bring a back up pair, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Trees For Life

customer_reviews.title: I did one patch first and needed to apply the second but they worked great. I get sick when I am the passenger ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our upcoming cruise but wanted to try them before to see how they worked. I did one patch first and needed to apply the second but they worked great. I get sick when I am the passenger in any car and I did not get sick. My daughter tried them as well and they worked for her. A natural remedy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am still on my cruise writing this. That is how good these are. I used to use the transderm patches. Bad side effects. They did work. Caused bad breath. Dry mouth. Dialated pupils. THESE ARE AWESOME! none of the above side effects. Only takes away the sea sick. No drowsy. These are going to be my go to patches from now on. We had the most rough seas I have ever been in and not an ounce of woosy. I brought an arsenal in case these were a fail but didn't need them. So happy to have found these! Give them a try!
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: The listing does not indicate or do the pictures of this product show that these transdermal patches are made in China. The patches arrived with a "Made in China" sticker on the front, which is not evident on the listing photos. Transdermal patches, whether herbal or not, have medication which is absorbed directly into the body. If I had known the product was from China, I would have strictly avoided.
customer_reviews.author: carlyryan

customer_reviews.title: ... my mom who has congestive heart failure and the horrible nausea that goes along with it preventing her from ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mom who has congestive heart failure and the horrible nausea that goes along with it preventing her from eating and just making her feel horrible. I've tried fresh ginger tea , ginger ale, ginger capsules, ginger lozenges but nothing helped except these patches.They are an answer to my prayers. Wonderful for patients who are chemically sensitive to medications. They work wonders for her and work fast!!!! Now I'm going to try them myself for the nausea I get when a migraine strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: WORKED GREAT FOR 7yo CARSICKNESS
customer_reviews.text: Worked amazingly for my 7 year old who has always suffered with motion sickness while driving long distances. I only put one patch on him about 15 min before we hit the road and he rode for 7 hours and never got sick. Wow just wow. This poor boy would start complaint about not feeling well before we would even leave just out of anticipation because he knows how sick he gets every time we r in the car for very long. So glad to have found these!
customer_reviews.author: N Herring

customer_reviews.title: MIRACLE WORKERS!
customer_reviews.text: We just went on our first cruise and my daughter and I did not get sea sick! I got sea sick once but I had not replaced my patches in a couple days. I put a new pair on and was better in 15 minutes! We bought Sea-Bands and they didn’t help at all! These patches are MIRACLE WORKERS! My daughter has very bad motion sickness and I was SO apprehensive about her getting sick on the cruise. NOT ONCE!
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great for missions travel
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to lessen the symptoms I experience while traveling in Haiti while on mission trips. They work wonderfully to keep me from getting nauseated. I use them in conjunction with sea bands and ginger root capsules. Only the hottest and roughest trips lead to zophran anymore (once vs. every other day on the entire trip). The patches are easy to transport. I keep a package in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: DoraymeTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Unhelpful
customer_reviews.text: I wore these for 5 days and still got motion sick on my cruise. When I went to see the doctor, the nurse told me not to wear patches because people who do wind up feeling worse. Wound up taking mecilizine to feel better so my advice is to medicate right before you start your trip.
customer_reviews.author: daddydaycare

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: We tried these patches because they were so inexpensive and because they claimed to have no side effects such as sleepiness and tiredness, etc. Both my husband and I used these while we were on a 14 day cruise. We both had great results. No seasickness at all. No drowsiness or other types of side effects. These patches were more of a natural type assistance and were okay to use with our other medications we take for other health issues. Very nice product. Very nice results. Worked very well. Can recommend.
customer_reviews.author: judy d fraughton

customer_reviews.title: No vertigo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a plane ride and a lot of car rides in to a foreign country. I have vertigo really bad. I was prepared to put my head between my legs and do other excerises to put my vertigo to a level of not puking my guts up level. I put these patches on like the directions says and not once did I feel ill or dizzy on the flight and my car rides were so much easier to handles. I will buy these over and over again on all my trips even local long car rides
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hodge

customer_reviews.title: A cruisers must have!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on two cruises, one with these patches and one without. I will never go on another cruise without these! I wore one patch below my belly button, and one on my neck, throughout most of it. I didn’t want to risk getting seasick. I also changed them every day after the pool or shower. It’s probably not necessary, but I didn’t want to take any chances. I have tried the wristbands, ginger tablets & dremamine. They did not work, but this did!
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Great for cruises and they work so well!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my first cruise. They worked great for me. I changed them every two days and never had any problems. Matter of fact, a little story for ya.....when we got back from our cruise, I pulled those patches off thinking ok, we’re on dry land now, won’t need these anymore, right? Wrong! I actually had motion sickness AFTER the cruise believe it or not. So I took a new pair of patches and wore them for the next few days and they helped tremendously! I’d def recommend!
customer_reviews.author: S. Innes

customer_reviews.title: I would not go all herbal for something like this. Just go to the doctor and get ...
customer_reviews.text: These patches did not work AT ALL! I went on a charter fishing boat and knew I was prone to getting motion sickness. I made sure to get these patches to ensure that I wouldn't get sick and 45 minutes into the trip I was puking. I was on a 12 hour trip so it made the rest of my day miserable. I would not go all herbal for something like this. Just go to the doctor and get the patch from them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended by parents who had a terrible motion sickness experience year before
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my parents who did not want to experience the terrible motion sickness they experience on their cruise last year. That time they tried those wristbands that are supposed to help with motion sickness and they did nothing for them. However, this time, they said they didn't feel any kind of motion sickness at all with these patches. They wore them on their stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Janell G.

customer_reviews.title: Not effective. at. all.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work at all. I HIGHLY recommend prescription patches from your doctor. Got these for my last cruise & used TWO at a time for the first two days. I got absolutely zero results. I am 5'10"/240lbs and don't know if my size is too great for the natural ingredients to be effective. But, I got some scopolamine patches from my cousin and felt a difference within an hour or so. The prescription patches last about 2-3 days. These went directly into the trash. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Rashad R.

customer_reviews.title: Help for Vertigo
customer_reviews.text: First, this seller is quick and efficient. I got the product quickly as promised. As for the patches, I used them in unison with the wrist bands because I had vertigo for the first time in my life and was starting a new job. I was prescribed a medication but found it made me tired so I ordered these and I was able to make it to my new job without looking like I was drunk (vertigo makes you walk like you're on a ship). Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: I made sure to take dramamine for the rest of the cruise and I did fine.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it worked or not. This was my first time using these. I usually take dramamine. I tend to get motion sickness while in a car so I try to take dramamine and it always work. I used the patch for a 7 day cruise. It worked the first 3 days then I started getting sick. I took dramamine and had to lay in bed for a day. I made sure to take dramamine for the rest of the cruise and I did fine.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkivy

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised how well these work! I used them on an 11 day cruise, and travel before and after... Didn't get sick once! I will say, after snorkeling for a few hours, I would change the patch, as I could start to feel it didn't work quite as well for me. But compared to the $300 for the Rx patch... I will happily buy more so I can change them more often!
customer_reviews.author: hockeygirlmn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help me
customer_reviews.text: These didn't help me. I have sensitive skin, and they burned and itched around the edges while I wore them and didn't help with motion sickness. But I took the risk and got them anyway, knowing that they were just that, a risk. I also recognize that my nausea is a very difficult case, so I can't entirely blame the product for not helping!
customer_reviews.author: jnpearson85

customer_reviews.title: Great for cruising!
customer_reviews.text: These patches are awesome. No doctor needed. Just put behind your ear and forget about sea sickness. I wore these on a 7 day cruise and had zero issues with sea sickness. My entire family wore them. I normally get a little queasy but not with my patch on. You can wear one or two but I just wore one with no problems. I wore for several days, even swam in the ocean and they stuck on me for about 3 days. Awesome product, will definitely buy again for my next cruise and they do not make drowsy either nor mess with other meds.
customer_reviews.author: dantheman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I get seriously seasick on a cruise, and these are my favorite things to use to combat that as they are super easy to use. You just stick 1-2 on and forget about it. The first day on my first cruise, I didn't use these, and I was miserable, but using them every other day really minimized the sea sicknesses. I would never cruise without these!
customer_reviews.author: Kara T.

customer_reviews.title: It worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I have moderate motion sickness, and these worked. I was really skeptical, but after using these for a week long cruise I would buy them again. They were not enough for me on the last REALLY rough water day, and I had to take a dramamine, but I loved not having the sleepy side effects that I get from having to take most motion sickness meds. They do have a slight herbal/minty/rubber smell when you first take them out of the package, but it didn't bother me when they were on.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Guest

customer_reviews.title: Worked great
customer_reviews.text: We bought these and a back up dissoluble tabs in case these didn't work, I didn't end up needing the tabs because these worked so well. I get sick out in the ocean pretty quick. We took a fishing trip and I didn't even get sick a little. I forgot the tab was still on and wore it for the two hour car ride home. I normally get car sick as well, especially if I am doing stuff on my phone. I was on my for for a lot of the car trip and didn't get sick either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: We went on a trip to Yosemite National Park, and also went to Kings Canyon and Sequoia National Park along the way. The roads had several switchbacks. I followed the instructions and applied them prior to departure but I still felt very sick to my stomach on the drive and we had to pull over a few times to prevent me from getting sick. I tried them again the next day just to make sure, because I really wanted them to work, but they didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Tami N.

customer_reviews.title: Mild relief from motion sickness
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for vacation . They worked for the car ride over, I generally get nauseated when looking at my phone in the car. Unfortunately when it came down to kayaking on the ocean these didn’t really help. I used two and still was very sea sick. These are probably better for mild motion sickness
customer_reviews.author: sabrina birch

customer_reviews.title: Motion in the Ocean did not get us down
customer_reviews.text: Kind of a hard review to give since never 100% sure it was effective but here i go. We had two separate cruises booked. One for a group of three and another for a group of 6. 9 different people. 8 of the 9 were first time cruisers. Everyone wore the patches and no one was sick. The boats were definitely moving. We had seasoned cruisers tell us the ships were really swaying compared to normal. So no one was sick, we wore the patches but I don’t know what it would have been like if we didn’t wear the patches.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great product - better than dramamine!
customer_reviews.text: Once I put these on behind my ears I completely forgot they were there! Very comfortable. My only recommendation would be to put them on about an hour or so before I like the 30 minutes it says because I felt a delay in the patches working. Went on a ferry from Miami to the Bahamas which was 2.5 hours and the first 45 minutes I felt a little discomfort ( I put the patch on 20 minutes before going) but then the rest of the ferry there and the way back I felt no motion sickness at all!
customer_reviews.author: krysta

customer_reviews.title: Two patches and no seasickness!
customer_reviews.text: Found out my husband gets seasick on a week long snorkeling trip, whether on the boat or swimming in the water. Tried non drowsey dramamine, bonine, and a ginger gum before amazon could deliver these, but these patches were the only one that worked without any drowsiness or other side effects! He used two patches, one behind each ear, and he was finally able to enjoy a day in/on the water. So glad I found these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miracle patch!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! I bought for an international trip where I would be on buses, trains and ferries and I didn’t feel queasy once. A travel companion did get super sick on the bus; when we stopped and I heard how she was feeling, I convinced her to use the patch and she hugged me after, saying how give minutes after she put the patch on she felt so much better! I have always suffered from motion sickness, but she never had- it was nice to be able to provide relief to both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Debsgd

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly, It Works
customer_reviews.text: My tween daughter usually needs Dramamine for any car trip over 20 minutes or so. The problem is, of course, that it knocks her out. I bought these despite not being completely convinced that the majority of the positive reviews weren’t paid for or fake. I put Dramamine in the glove box, just in case, and put one of these stickers behind her ear. Not only did she not complain of being carsick, but she even read a book in the car, something she’s never been able to do before. We’re really happy with this purchase. Honestly, I’m still surprised though. I never expected it to work at all much less as well as it did.
customer_reviews.author: MMA

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My husband suffer with motion sickness and we always got Dramamine and he would get very sleep. We always lost a day almost from our vacation. I decide to look for something natural and found the MQ motions sickness patch. Wow. It was a life safer. He was kind scary. The whole flight he felt nothing, and never got sleep. We always will be getting this patches for our flights.
customer_reviews.author: Caqui

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These work great! I used these on my cruise instead of a script. I had a bad reaction once removing the prescription patches so I did some research and found these. What caught me was that they were all natural. Using one did not work for me but I was fine after I added another one. There were no side affects after removal. I waited a few days and didn't remove them right away. I will definitely be using these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best Investment for Cruise!
customer_reviews.text: These patches are amazing! I get violently sea/motion sick and I put these little gems on behind my ears and rode for 3 hours in a 3rd row, no dizziness, nothing... was riding to a 7 day cruise... not once did I get sick all week!!! We even had some rough waters from the tail end of Hurricane Katia.... nothing! I will never leave home without these!!! <3
customer_reviews.author: Christee V.

customer_reviews.title: Made me sicker
customer_reviews.text: These patches were very strong and quickly made me feel dizzy. I wore them for one day crossing the drake passage on the way to Antarctica and felt better when I took them off. I had more motion sickness as well with the patch on than off. I did not wear them on the return trip and although we had much rougher waters, I was less sick without them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: Just finished an 11-day cruise. I used these and had absolutely no problems with motion sickness. No side effects at all. They have an odd smell when you first put it on but nothing bad and it goes away after a couple hours. I had tried the prescription patch prior to the cruise and could not wear it over 8 hours b/c of the side effects, dry mouth, brain fog, restless legs...terrible. These had none of that!! Stayed on in the shower & while swimming. Worked for me and will definitely use again!!
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Holy cow they work
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical as to how well these patches would work. I wholeheartedly recommend them. I have horrible motion sickness. I get sick from watching a merry go round go in circles. I had to use two patches and they lasted me anywhere from 24-48hours. Unfortunately I was on a 7day cruise and it seems the longer we were on the boat, the patches lasted less and less time. Our trip was also just during very choppy waters. So I did need to take some Dramamine once or twice a day as we neared the end of the cruise. But these are definitely worth the cost, they're actually great for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: I would never have believed it!!
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t believe in most “natural“ or herbal remedies. This one shocked me by totally curing my wife of motion sickness during a 12 day cruise where there was a lot of motion. Each patch would last two days and she could feel right away when the effect was starting to wear off. Extremely effective and surprisingly inexpensive. I still can’t quite believe it. A MUST try for anyone with motion sickness.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon S. Groff

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was hopeful this patch would work for me. I was on a small ship in the sound for a children's based excursion for 90 mins. I placed the patch per instructions, 2 days prior to the excursion. Placing a new one each day, including the day of. I became motion sick within the first 15 mins and ended up throwing up several times upon returning to the dock.
customer_reviews.author: kinlanie

customer_reviews.title: This actually works!
customer_reviews.text: So every year my husband and I take a road trip through the mountains of Colorado. All those curvy roads and scary overpasses really send me reeling. I decided to try motion sickness patches because they had some decent reviews. I was very surprised after a 12 hr road trip that I hadn't experienced any nausea, discomfort or anxiety from the drive. I started to realize that my stomach was feeling so solid and sturdy through every curve that I really couldn't believe this patch was actually working. I definitely recommend trying this patch if you have any issues with motion sickness!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Great results!
customer_reviews.text: I read some negative reviews and i was skeptical, but I'm glad I didn't pay attention to ignorance. They're amazing (so I'm told). My mom and her boyfriend bought a pack to go on a cruise and they absolutely loved it. They used to use prescription expensive patches and these are just as good. They came back from their trip and bought another pack (without even needing it). Just in case Amazon stops selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Great option for cruises!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a cruise we recently had the pleasure of taking. I put on one patch prior to the first leg of our flight. I put on a second patch the day we boarded the ship. I used two patches the entire cruise- one behind each ear. The patches have a slight fragrance- but it goes away quickly. The patches even stayed on while snorkeling! Most importantly, I wasn’t seasick once and it was nice to not have the medicated feeling that many of the oral pills cause.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Fisher

customer_reviews.title: THEY WORK
customer_reviews.text: the things work great, we cruise alot and i wouldn't go without them. 1st cruise we went on I had a case of motion sickness off and on, next cruise I started using the patches when I noticed I was feeling it again, they stopped it. I now put them on before I even get on thje ship and I have no problems, I keep and extra box around all the time.
customer_reviews.author: eric warren

customer_reviews.title: Life changing!
customer_reviews.text: These really work. I get horrible motion sickness when riding in the mountains. Like have to plan to be sick for every outing and make time to recoup before doing anything. I didn’t get sick once with these. I used two and changed them every other day. They smell like dirt but you are the only one who smells them so I didn’t care because they worked and didn’t dilate my eyes like the prescription ones. I couldn’t even see with the rx ones but the end of my cruise. I will be stocking up on these for ever single trip I take now! This is life changing!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Air

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! Some Packs Were Empty
customer_reviews.text: 5 star when it comes to how effective these things worked. I struggle with motion sickness very badly and I was worried that I would be miserable on our cruise, but every time I put my patches on about 15 minutes I felt like I was back to normal. I changed them out every time I showered so I never noticed them not being effective, but it definitely last all day and there’s enough in the box to last you a week on a cruise. The only reason I rate this a 3 star is because I had three packs in this box with the patches missing.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: If you read my dramamine review, you will see that I went on a fishing trip. Well I forgot to mention on the other review that I also was wearing two of these patches. Well none of it worked! I love natural stuff, but I am disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful!
customer_reviews.text: For the past 40 years, I used prescription Scopolomine in a transderm patch when traveling. Unfortunately, I'm one of numerous people who experience severe withdrawal symptoms after the last dose- as in bedridden for a week afterward. For an 18-day cruise, I thought I'd give this patch a try. Negative- I could only go 2 days instead of 3 before changing the patch Positive- As effective as the scop with NO withdrawal symptoms at all at the end of the trip! I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I have horrible horrible motion sickness to preface this. So we were about to go on the cruise when I got some of these and put them on as soon as we boarded the boat. I was scared of being sick so I used two patches at a time. The box says 1 to 2 patches for so many hours. But these aren't just good for motion sickness, they're great for drinking too!! I was wondering why I wasn't as tipsy as normal drinking on the cruise. These little patches are literal life savers. I highly reccommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Revels

customer_reviews.title: No more sleeping pills for me!
customer_reviews.text: I get MISERABLY sea sick on a cruise, but tried these out on the last one in lieu of Dramamine (can't stand how sleepy it makes me!!). I took ginger at night, changed my patches out every day (says it lasts longer but I can't take chances with my motion sickness), and drank ginger ale on the rougher sea days. I had no problems whatsoever AND didn't have to walk around groggy all the time from the pills.
customer_reviews.author: Anna K.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Completely disappointed in this product. After reading the wonderful reviews, I purchased these patches for a whale watching trip, but they did not work at all. My boyfriend and I placed two patches each (one on ear and one on naval) hours before getting on the boat, hoping that it would help us during the boat ride. Unfortunately, we suffered severe sea sickness during the whole three hours of the trip. They also had a strong odor, somewhat reminding me of moldy bread. I wouldn’t recommend this to my friends. Probably look for something better out there.
customer_reviews.author: my

customer_reviews.title: 100% WORKS
customer_reviews.text: These patches are amazing. I suffer from motion car sickness but I purchased these patches and the wristbands for my first cruise. The first day I got on the cruise ship I put the band and 3 hours after I started to get dizziness and nauseous and then I decided to use this patch one behind each ear just to make sure and suddenly no more seasickness, no nothing for 5 days. I just changed on the third day just for precautions.
customer_reviews.author: Barros Family

customer_reviews.title: Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I will never go on another cruise without these patches!! It was our family's 2nd cruise. First one we sailed in the Gulf of Mexico, waters were not too rough. An occasional fast dissolving dramamine kept nausea at bay. But this 2nd cruise we sailed in the Atlantic ocean and it was much rockier. I was about to get sick when I put these patches on and within 5 minutes my stomach settled down and the motion sickness completely subsided! I couldn't believe how well they worked. I experienced now side effects. I put one patch behind my ear and another at my navel. I will never travel on another cruise again without them.
customer_reviews.author: osustamm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Dizziness and Nausea
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel any motion while on the ship all 10 days. I recommend these patches for all to use. I gave some away to anyone not feeling well while on our trip! This even helped out a member of our group that had too much to drink the night before!! Update: These patches even help with vertigo at home. I used these on my mom when she was complaining that she had been feeling dizzy all day. So these patches work even after you already feel dizziness.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 5-day cruise. I’m assuming they worked as I wore them the whole time and never got sick. I get carsick as a passenger reading and have been known to get slightly nauseous on planes if I don’t take anything so I played it safe and bought these for the cruise. No issues! I got them wet in the shower and they still worked. I only changed them out once. Worth the try!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cruises!!!
customer_reviews.text: These motion sickness patches really work!! My fiancé and I always get nauseous on cruises, so we decided to give these a try and we are glad we did!! They really do last 1-3 days. We removed and applied a new patch every other day just to be safe, wearing just one patch each. The boat was very rocky but we never got sick!!! I will say, these do cause some drowsiness, but I’ll take sleepiness over sickness any day!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally saved me!
customer_reviews.text: I get motion sickness very easily and I had to fly three times to reach a destination due to the covid. I was too paranoid to use anything that I take orally so I opted for a patch. This one literally saved my ass through the whole flight and it didn't bother me at all. Only way I'd remember it was behind my ears was by the cool sensation I feel there and it is super soothing. Thanks to the patch, I didn't have to suffer through the flights /though it is hard to say it was a breeze what with all the virus and everything/ and I am very grateful!
customer_reviews.author: Zokky

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!!!!!!!! We were recently on a cruise with the roughest waters!! Definitely had motion sickness!! I am super sensitive to medicines and thought I would bring these along just in case....boy was I glad!!!!! Put one behind each ear and on both wrists!!!! Worked amazing and without the drowsy affect!!!!!!!! Nausea was gone and stayed gone! Reapplied after 48 hours!!! My fellow travelers were also happy I had these!!!!!! Definitely be purchasing again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Raine

customer_reviews.title: Gave me my life back
customer_reviews.text: I would get dizzy riding the elevator to work, driving, even small heights would cause intense dizzy spells. I started to give up hope that i would ever be able to live a normal life and enjoy activities like i use to. I purchased these for my work party - which was on a boat - but decided to try them out a few days prior. I am happy to say that not only did i feel great at my work party but i have not had a dizzy spell in about a week and a half. The patch has frankincense oil so the smell is calming.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works amazingly.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter would get car sick even with prescription meds. I was about to pull my hair out. These have been a lifesaver. We even went on a school trip and several of the students were getting sick on the plane. Thank heavens I had extras. I was the hero of the trip. I haven't shared with anyone, so far, that has not been helped by these. They last forever. They are great even when sick with the flu or such.
customer_reviews.author: L. Canon

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our first cruise, never been on a boat. I wore one the first day and the next morning felt horrible and the rest of the time I wore two and changed them daily (highest reccomended dosage) and was completely fine ever in rough water. I get carsick scrolling social media.l and will use one of these for long car trips. My mom pays $60 for prescription ones and I told her to buy these for our next cruise!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t help me on the plane. I still almost threw up upon landing. Felt sick 80% of the flight. Also since it didn’t help for my flight there’s no way keeping it on will help for the next three days. Says lasts 1-3 days Will try it again when I’m flying home and hopefully update here
customer_reviews.author: Monica Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Must get for sea sickness!
customer_reviews.text: Got super sick on a cruise so decided for the next cruise I needed to try something other than Dramamine to prevent sea sickness and this was the golden ticket! Never felt sick and wore these the entire cruise! Not sure what kind of magic is in these patches but I will never cruise without them. I also wore them when traveling by plane and felt fabulous the entire time! I will always have these in my medicine cabinet now!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Allowed me to enjoy two cruises!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product on two week-long cruises that were 18 months apart. One was a small ship cruise and the other a sailboat. I have had bad seasickness in the past but these patches made me completely immune to it with absolutely no side effects. The small ship cruise was in very rough seas. Many passengers and even some staff were ill. I was fine. The sailboat was in the open waters for a week and again I was fine. I was able to swim and shower with no reduction in effectiveness. I did change them every 72 hours or so. These patches were an absolute lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: RI Mom

customer_reviews.title: Better than tablets
customer_reviews.text: I can't add a photo because my son took the product with him to NYC on his senior trip.... But wow! I had no idea these existed! They are wonderful. My son was not allowed any tablets, understandably, on this trip, but he was allowed these. They made a big difference in controlling his car sickness from the bus.
customer_reviews.author: McFree

customer_reviews.title: Got a reaction to it
customer_reviews.text: I used it during my international flight. It didn't make me sleepy like other motion sickness pills do. I couldn't tell if this product worked for me because I couldn't use it after the first time. I put it behind my hear on my neck area and had a reaction to it. The skin area where I placed the patch became very red and itchy the day after I removed it. I know it was from the patch because it was only that one rounded area where I had this reaction.
customer_reviews.author: jann

customer_reviews.title: I ended up wearing the patches around my belly button on the cruise and it worked so much better. It is now my preferred spot for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a cruise I went on. I did some testing at an amusement park and in a car before my cruise. Discovered that behind my ears caused me to have massive headaches. I ended up wearing the patches around my belly button on the cruise and it worked so much better. It is now my preferred spot for the patches. I still had to take some 24 hour medicine to help because I get really bad motion sickness but the two combined helped me enjoy my cruise. Will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney H.

customer_reviews.title: Different than before
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased these 4 times and it has always been great until now.. These patches were not the same as the others and I could tell the second I opened it. These had a foul odor and do NOT work. I’m super disappointed and will go back to getting a prescription from the doctor.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Well working medicine for nausea
customer_reviews.text: First time when I decided to buy I thought it will be just "fake" mean for motion sickness.I have 2 girls who suffer from the motion sickness even if we drive for short distances. When I put to the kids I didn't believe that it helps.However, I was mistaken. Our trip for 200 miles was without any complaints for nausea and request to stop for burping out.At that time we could reach our destination in clean clothing , nice mood and happy.After that I am having them in my bag as required medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Zhanar

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I get airsick so I normally take Bonine but was looking for natural alternatives. These patches did not work for me and I used twice the patches. I still felt queasy and nauseous on the plane ride...Bonine is more effective for me so will most likely stick to using them :(
customer_reviews.author: Hannah S.

customer_reviews.title: Cruise Magic!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I just got back from my first cruise ever. I was worried that I would get sick, so I purchased Bonine, bands, and patches. After the muster drill, I didn't think I would make it. Just looking at the water made me ill. I did get sick later even after wearing the sea bands. Once I put the patches on, I was good to go! I enjoyed the rest of my cruise and will never get on another boat without these behind my ears. I used two and switched them about once every other day.
customer_reviews.author: Susan & Brian

customer_reviews.title: Best motion sickness prevention EVER!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who gets motion sick VERY easily, these are a lifesaver. Bought for my 2nd cruise...on the first, tried the wrist bands that don’t do anything. This time, I used these along with Dramamine. It worked fantastic! They have an herbally smell, which is strong but not unpleasant. We encountered a hurricane, which made the cruise a very rocky experience, like hard to walk. Almost everyone was sick...but not me!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have any issues with motion sickness on boats
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product to anyone that has issues with motion sickness. I was worried going on the cruise with my family and not being able to enjoy it. This product gave me my freedom. It truly worked, I keep them on the entire time. Even when the boat was rocking, I did not get sick.
customer_reviews.author: S Walker

customer_reviews.title: Travel worthy!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my Hubby went on a cruise in February and we were both afraid that We would get seasick. I bought these motion sickness patches to see if they would help. It came with 20. Our cruise was for seven days and we have never been on one. I put a motion sickness patch on the night before getting on the boat in throughout the days I never got sick once. Mind you, I am the type to get sick in the car so now that I know that these work I will be buying more. The smell isn’t bad and there easily to put on. I found the best place to put them was behind the ear!
customer_reviews.author: Brittani

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for flight (turbulence) and sea sick. I put one behind ear and one above belly button at least 30 min beforehand. So far, this always worked like a charm and saved me from getting nauseous even from the 10 minutes long terrible turbulence on the plane. I always make sure I have them readily available at home.
customer_reviews.author: tippan

customer_reviews.title: Great little patches especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Completely perfect product. Bought these for my first cruise as I was nervous about motion sickness being very easily prone to getting very dizzy. These were a total lifesaver. My boyfriend ended up using them as well since he felt the rocking too but felt 100% better after slipping these on. Highly recommended for anyone that gets motion sick. Even better since they claimed to be herbal so no side effects with any other drugs. I was also using Dramamine so I don't know how they do on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for road trips
customer_reviews.text: These patches are a necessity for for children who get car sick. We also used them on a cruise. They worked well for children and adults. Easy to apply and remove. I like that they have natural ingredients. They have a pleasant cinnamon smell. I only smell them when first applying the patch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps My Entire Family
customer_reviews.text: We love to take family road trips, but a couple of the kids get very sick. We didn't want to medicate them, so gave these patches a try. Now we use them every time we head out in the car together and the kids haven't been sick once. They are simple to use and work wonders. Plus, the smell is soothing. I highly recommend these patches to anyone struggling with motion sickness. We use them in conjunction with the motion sickness bands.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jones

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: used these on 4 people during a cruise. No one ever got sick, even someone who ALWAYS gets motion sickness in the car. They have a slight smell when you first put them on, and depending on activity level, sweat and shower schedule they didn't stay on 3 days. No worries the package was big enough to cover us anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: These work so well for me! I get incredibly motion sick even after just a few minutes. I first used these on a cruise. I wore them on each ear and changed them every other day and I had no issues! I could not believe they worked. I then used them for a cross country road trip and I was shocked that they helped so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I had low expectations. My 10yo gets severe motion sickness after about 10 minutes. We had 20 hours in the car, one-way. I expected it to be a nightmare. I bought multiple motion-sickness products, but this is the ONLY ONE that worked on its own without the others. And on top of that, it was the least invasive. We even forgot about them because they were hidden and stayed on through swimming pools, the ocean, and showers. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Britni E

customer_reviews.title: They worked pretty well. I initially put only one on but ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently used this patches on a cruise. They worked pretty well. I initially put only one on but like on the 3rd day on the cruise started feeling seasick so I put another one. Still felt sick but I think the boat was rocking too much anyways. Overall, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not sure they work
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea of these patches, and with my kids prone to motion sickness in the car, I'm willing to try everything. But multiple times my kids have been wearing these patches and have still been nauseous to the point of vomiting after a car ride. I don't think the patches help, at least with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: dilley

customer_reviews.title: They helped a some
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything. acupuncture, Seabands, bonine, dramamine, ginger, sleeping. NOTHING works! I am so sensitive when it comes to motion sickness. I discovered these and bought them on a whim. They have made motion sickness a bit more tolerable. I always keep these on hand in my purse and use them as needed. I don't ever want to be without.
customer_reviews.author: CurvyKimchi

customer_reviews.title: LIFE SAVING
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough positive about these life savers. My 5 year old would get car sick all the time. A 20 minute drive and he would vomit After finding these, no more car sickness. I even use them for my 2 year old who is prone to car sickness and my wife. These are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Helped ease cruise sickness
customer_reviews.text: While I typically don't get seasick, I purchased these before my first cruise just in case. I'm glad I did! We had an unusually rocky first day on the ship (like stay in bed rocky) following a storm, and these were a life saver. This helped us navigate the first 24-48 hours walking to get food and around the cabin.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Best sea sickness patch
customer_reviews.text: This saved me on a cruise. I was skeptical at first that they wouldnt be as good as the ones from my doctor. I was wrong. There are 20 to a box and I only used a few. Our Ship was extremely rocky with people sick everywhere because of it. I was lucky and purchased these ahead of time. I will never go on a cruise without them!
customer_reviews.author: Darcie

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm!!
customer_reviews.text: I just came back from my first cruise and used 2 patches (one behind each ear) for the duration of my cruise. I get motion sickness very easily and these patches did exactly what they were meant for. I never missed a meal and my stomach wasn't queazy despite the constant waves and motion with the ship. I'll never be without these on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Snacker22

customer_reviews.title: WARNING
customer_reviews.text: This did not help my child at all with her motion sickness. She only had the patch on for a couple hours, and it caused her to break out in itchy hives. The hives started around her ear and then spread over her whole body. Disappointing because I wanted a “natural” alternative to motion sickness medication. Please be careful using, especially on children.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: These worked great on our cruise cor my 9 year old who has motion sickness even on short drives so I did not expect much. On the third day she started feeling sick and replaced the pads as the instructions say and within 20 was feeling 100 percent again! Will keep on hand from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Turner

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I get bad motion sickness. I use this on long car rides and on cruises. Works great and I keep it on for two days. Stays on showering, in the heat, and swimming. Note: I still use Dramamine on the cruise along with the patches. On long car rides I only sit in the back for an hour or two max.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all.
customer_reviews.text: I applied a patch behind each ear. I then boarded a 48 foot sail boat heading to Catalina Island. Each time the boat stopped at sea for my buddies to check their fishing line, I felt totally nauseated and threw up immediately. This continued for the next 3 hours, where I threw up over 25 times. I have used the wrist bands and Dramamine on previous trips and those worked better. I threw these patches away and will never use them again.
customer_reviews.author: christopher scolinos

customer_reviews.title: Good product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: My physician recommended this product to me as I do like the side effects of the prescription medications used for Vertigo. They work great, with no side effects, excellent price, and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Heide Perry

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with seasickness, carsickness, vertigo type symptoms. I was so impressed with how the immediate relief was when I put these on. I put them on behind my ears the day before a long fishing trip and it actually made me feel better that day left them on when I showered and they were still good through the next day.
customer_reviews.author: tera arnold

customer_reviews.title: I want to buy these in bulk!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these. I get extreme motion sickness while sitting in the back of vehicles, riding airplanes, going on rides... but these AMAZING little things took all that away. I was able to enjoy my vacation. The only dislike I had is the initial smell of it when you put it on... but it quickly wears off and lasts at least the full 72 hours. The patches stayed on through two showers, a trip to the ocean and an amusement park and I still had to peel them off. They work like a charm. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: I put two of these on and i never got truly nauseous and slept fine.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been on a few cruises and we usually use these. We just went on one that had insane bumpiness the last night to the extent they put bags out on elevators for anyone who got sick. I put two of these on and i never got truly nauseous and slept fine.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

product_meta.title: MQ Motion Sickness Patch, 20 Count
feature_bullets: 100% Natural Herb Treatment,No pills or side effects
Safe for kids up to 4, NOT used by Pregnant and Surgery body.
Easy to apply and Painless to remove.
Attach 10 minutes behind ear before the travel,last about 1-3 days
Small and Light packing for best travel partner.
